original_title: 私たちは有名なアイドルになる為にお金持ちのオジサンたちのチ〇ポをしゃぶって枕営業をしています。
overview: Although she belongs to a small production company, Riri is gradually gaining attention as an idol. Yuna entered the same production company because she admired Riri. In order to become a top idol, she has behind-the-scenes business that must be done...
title: We’re Sucking Rich Old Men’s Dicks to Become Famous Idols, and We’re Pillow Fighting
